title: IPH 23 -  He made the water wet

lines: He made the land stay dry,
He put twinkle in the stars,
God looked at His world and said,
He put a touch of wag
God looked at His world and said,

chorus:
Good, good, good! He said,
 ‘That’s good!’
Good, good, good! God looked at
 His world and said,
 ‘That’s good!’
CCLI: Dennis Allen and Nan Allen CCLI 128675
